text:
[Verse]
Moonlight in the city
Shadows come to play
Dancing through the alleys
In the night we sway

[Verse 2]
Neon lights are flashing
Echoes of a beat
Whispering our secrets
On the empty street

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows twirl and spin
In the night we find our kin
Worries fade with every turn
In the dark we brightly burn

[Verse 3]
Footsteps soft and hurried
Rhythm in the air
Spinning in the darkness
Freedom everywhere

[Bridge]
Midnight brings no ending
Just another start
In the shadows dancing
We reveal our hearts

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows twirl and spin
In the night we find our kin
Worries fade with every turn
In the dark we brightly burn
title: Dancing Shadows
